description:
Part 1
A very popular orchestral happens to have a lewd switch, and when that switch is turned on there is no turning off until she`s satisfied!
Part 2
A tutor for a wealthy boy ends up turning him into an A student, however he has a proposition for her for some "extracurricular activities" so that she can continue her tutoring...
Source: hanime

titles.title: Dondon Fella Harmony Gakudan / Challenge Chichi Nensei
ドンドンフェラハーメニー楽団 / チャレンジ乳年生
